section.title: Device
section.p: This is a physical device (UE) and could be a phone, SIM, water/gas/electricity meter, car, or a computer. Subscriptions can be attached to a device and it is possible for each device to have unlimited (or at least 100) subscriptions associated to it, which can be used for the various usage types. A device can exist in the database or be created as part of a subscribers profile. The device record contains an indicator of its type (for example, an Apple Iphone or Samsung Galaxy S6), which is mapped to a TAC database, stored either internally or externally. The device record contains the IMEI where appropriate for that type of device or some other device indicator.
The Provisioning module will also append the pre-filled values along with the changed values while sending the Update request to the NCC.
